channel.title: Connection issue after updates
channel.description: basically everytime i restart the server or do a update in my cmd it says the servers online however u have to wait about 5min before you can actually get in, any idea why it does this.

item.title: Connection issue after updates
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

yh i have no idea i tried using the original backup aswell but it wouldnt let me connect.

Read full topic

item.title: Connection issue after updates
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

I had a problem once with my server, it just randomly dcd people out and stopped accepting connections, it didnt even print out anything lol, I dumped the project week after.

yh but its generally stupid if im tweaking the smallest things a 5min job will take me over 1hour and + theres one random server i could connect to once now i cant at all for some reason.

item.title: Connection issue after updates
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

nathanrr44:

i have one server that worked one time now it randomly just doesnt work. 5mins is awefull ive had servers where it doesnt even properly disconnect you because it reloads that fast.

Well its bad of course but in terms of other problems which could occur its nothing bad. People not being able to connect for 5mins won’t kill them;p.

Read full topic
